name: mal-workspace
description: Monorepo for MyAnimeList database, MCP servers, scrapers, and chat client

scripts.scraper:check-stats: cd database/own-mal-db && npm run dev -- src/scripts/checkDatabaseStats.ts
scripts.scraper:reviews: cd database/own-mal-db && npm run dev -- src/scripts/reviewCrawler.ts
scripts.scraper:track-growth: cd database/own-mal-db && npm run dev -- src/scripts/trackGrowth.ts
scripts.mcp:build-all: npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/anime-search-mcp && npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/mal-user-mcp && npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/anime-recommendation-mcp
scripts.start:all: npm run docker:up && npm run db:start

author: Leo Vainio
